phrases: Enough that I would even say marvelously so.
However, I am growing tired of this fight.
I am thinking it is about time to bring it to a conclusion.
Before the end, let me ask you, just in case.
Would not you like to work underneath me?
It would be a shame to have to wipe out all that power you have.
You would be able to do work so much better than Commander Ginyu.
You have got to be kidding.
You really expect me to accept that offer?
I thought you would say that.
You Saiyans as a group are stubborn to the point of being fools.
Well, there is only one route left for you to take.
It will not be so easy.
But I am aware of what you are doing.
While you say you are being serious,
you are still keeping back a good deal of your power.
Keeping that in mind, the way I figure it,
using about 50 percent, or in other words, half of my max power,
I can turn you into space dust!
That is a bit of an exaggeration!
You are trying to feed me too large a bluff.
It is been quite a long time since I have had this kind of exercise.
Those two are just staring at each other now.
Both of them are searching for the right timing to begin again.
Besides which, it feels like we are about to be crushed by both of their tremendous Ki alone.
There is no way we can tell.
Their power is particularly greater than anything we can comprehend.
I am not this poor a pilot!
Why is it, with all my beauty and glamour, and my super-cute face, that I have be turned into a frog!?
Everything that is happened to me, it is all those guys' fault!
H- Hey you, what are you doing!?
Hurry up and give me my body back!
I cannot see in front of us!
B- Bulma-san, why have you come here?
Goku and Freeza are over there...
Bulma-san, you should not go there!
If you were to become one of my men, wonderful things would await you every day.
Every single one of them, so terribly obstinate.
That is what cost them their lives.
Freeza-sama's body is responding spontaneously to Goku's power!
After taking Goku's attacks, every nerve in his body has a precise read on him.
Is this the power of Freeza?
That over there is not me!
It is a frog, a frog!
You have finally gotten it, huh!?
What are you doing hanging around in a place like this?
You would better hurry and seek shelter somewhere, it is dangerous here!
Using about 50 percent, or in other words, half of my max power, I can turn you into space dust!
I did not see that at all!
To think that I should be able to see Freeza-sama's form like this!
Freeza-sama, I am so glad I trusted and stayed with you!
Father is the one getting beaten up!
Bulma-san, please go somewhere safe and take refuge right away!
I will never see another fight like this!
I wonder if she hit her head or something back when we left her by herself.
Again, I could not see Freeza's movement...
Can there be this much difference in our powers?
If I use only half of my max power, I could turn you into space dust, as I recall.
Tell Gohan I am waitin' for him here on Earth!
Ask Bulma-chan to bring us back some souvenirs of Planet Namek's cakes, okay!
We are comin' to save you right now!
Are we actually going to Planet Namek!?
It is about time for the countdown.
I do not want to die yet!
Never mind half my max power, I am not even using a third!
Looks like you are finally starting to get a little winded.
Then again, it is amazing you have not died yet.
To think he is this strong...!
Kaio-sama, Goku is still wearing that heavy gi, is not he?
What he has on now is only tough, it is not heavy.
There is nothing to worry about, Chaozu!
Goku is going to win this fight!
Are not you forgetting about the Kaio-ken technique?
With Goku as he is now, he should be able to withstand as much as ten times his regular power!
- All right! - All right, all right!
Regrettably, what he is using right now is that very 10x Kaio-ken...
There is too much difference in their abilities!
W- Who the hell are you!?
As Kaio's words cut off any encouraging news about Goku, who is already using a ten-fold Kaio-ken,
is there any glimmer of hope remaining for him?
And what of Ginyu, as he closes in?
